arStrings.szText: Each time the {c_important}Shadowblight{/c} Key Passive deals damage to enemies, it increases the next {c_important}Shadowblight's{/c} damage within {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c}, stacking up to {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} times.
